work.position: Application Software Analyst (Mid to Senior level Software Engineer equiv)
work.summary: First 3 years were maintaining and being the development lead for the product support area of the company. Current roll is working on a team focused the backend system (Avail, packaging, booking) engine of the system. This is a Full stack position. Other tasks I've also taken on include writing setup materials / documentation, consulted in system analysis tasks on system performance and monitoring, and mentored both new developers, and junior developers in our system.
highlights: 2014 - 2017 lead developer for the break-fix team. This involves knowledge of Trisept's entire system, debugging and resolving issues in the code base, and assisting in managing the company's off shore resources when needed.
2014-2019 - Active in a number of sub committees involving boosting company moral and wellness initiatives

2017, and 2018 "COSBE be the spark" Trisept representative: Helped organize Trisept presentation and vision. Demonstrated what roles and responsibilities Developers have, and showcased 2 custom applications that students could interact with involving real-time voice translation with AI

2017, Worked with Microsoft's Chicago offices and representatives, focusing on Azure deployment, bot technologies, cognitive services , and natural language processing including involvement in a hands on learning session Hackathon in developing a custom chat-bot.

work.summary: Blue7 Solutions LLC, a Joint Venture between Blue Star Infotech America Inc. and Trisept Solutions, leverages the extensive technology and solutions experience of both companies to solve business problems of modern day enterprises and software product companies. Half of my role was working with Trisept solutions to develop and maintain the companies dynamic packaging engine which bundled vacation packages together based on preset rules, and there booking engine which then booked the vacation packages. The second half of my role was to be the Development lead for the Product Support team, which involves knowledge of Trisept's entire system, debugging and resolving issues in the code base, and managing the company's off shore resources when needed.
highlights: Lead Developer and Engineer on Product Support team
participated in the companies wellness and event planing team, which focused on organizing events, participating in community outreach and promoting the company.
Consulting role. Had to maintain hours and keep projects within thresholds of hourly constraints

work.summary:
Developed and maintained the companies dynamic packaging engine which bundled vacation packages together based on preset rules, and there booking engine which then booked the vacation packages.
Technologies that interacted with at a given time included, C#, VB.net, SQL, XML, javascript and ASP.net
highlights: Lead Developer for companies vendor and supplier based web interface, "Solutions by Trisept".
Developed WCF services built on the .net framework.
Technical lead on migration from the 2.0 .Net framework to 4.0, and upgrading solutions to Visual studio 2010.
Worked with offshore development team.
Developed one off Windows Services.
OWASP Top 10 certified for PCI compliance.
Investigated new technologies to implement and integrate into existing code-bases.

work.summary: taught an overview of the computing field and computer technology trends with emphasis on terminology and concepts related to PC hardware and software components and their functions from a hands-on approach. Entry-level hands-on skills as well as theory in handling PC hardware were taught.
highlights: Presented course material in a concise manner that encouraged applied knowledge of theory to real world settings.
Demonstrated hardware repair methods and troubleshooting through interactive detailed lessons.
Administered and corrected examinations and home work assignments.
Maintained and kept office hours outside of normal work hours.
Class ranged from 20-30 students
Reported info directly to the Dean of the department.

work.summary: The course served as a foundation for understanding the logical function and process of computer programming in a given language environment. Basic computer programming knowledge and skills in logic and syntax were covered. Coding convention and procedures were discussed relevant to the given programming language environment.
highlights: Presented course material in a concise manner that encouraged applied knowledge of theory to real world settings.
